trans-unit.source: What's new in SQL Database V12 | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What's new in SQL Database V12 | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes why business systems that are using Azure SQL Database in the cloud will benefit by upgrading to version V12 now.
trans-unit.target: Describes why business systems that are using Azure SQL Database in the cloud will benefit by upgrading to version V12 now.

trans-unit.source: What's new in SQL Database V12
trans-unit.target: What's new in SQL Database V12

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the many advantages that the new V12 version of Azure SQL Database has over version V11.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the many advantages that the new V12 version of Azure SQL Database has over version V11.

trans-unit.source: We continue to add features to V12.
trans-unit.target: We continue to add features to V12.

trans-unit.source: So we encourage you to visit our Service Updates webpage for Azure, and to use its filters:
trans-unit.target: So we encourage you to visit our Service Updates webpage for Azure, and to use its filters:

trans-unit.source: Filtered to the <link><linkText>SQL Database service</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Filtered to the <link><linkText>SQL Database service</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Filtered to General Availability <link><linkText>(GA) announcements</linkText><title></title></link> for SQL Database features.
trans-unit.target: Filtered to General Availability <link><linkText>(GA) announcements</linkText><title></title></link> for SQL Database features.

trans-unit.source: The latest information about resource limits for SQL Database is documented at:<html></html><link><linkText>Azure SQL Database Resource Limits</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The latest information about resource limits for SQL Database is documented at:<html></html><link><linkText>Azure SQL Database Resource Limits</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Increased application compatibility with SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Increased application compatibility with SQL Server

trans-unit.source: A key goal for SQL Database V12 was to improve the compatibility with Microsoft SQL Server 2014.
trans-unit.target: A key goal for SQL Database V12 was to improve the compatibility with Microsoft SQL Server 2014.

trans-unit.source: Among other areas, V12 achieves parity with SQL Server in the important area of programmability.
trans-unit.target: Among other areas, V12 achieves parity with SQL Server in the important area of programmability.

trans-unit.source: For instance:
trans-unit.target: For instance:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Common Language Runtime (CLR) assemblies</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Common Language Runtime (CLR) assemblies</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Window functions</linkText><title></title></link>, with <link><linkText>OVER</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Window functions</linkText><title></title></link>, with <link><linkText>OVER</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>XML indexes</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>selective XML indexes</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>XML indexes</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>selective XML indexes</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Change tracking</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Change tracking</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>SELECT...INTO</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>SELECT...INTO</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Full-text search</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Full-text search</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Please see <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link> for the small set of features not yet supported in SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Please see <link><linkText>here</linkText><title></title></link> for the small set of features not yet supported in SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: More premium performance, new performance levels
trans-unit.target: More premium performance, new performance levels

trans-unit.source: In V12, we increased the database throughput units (DTUs) allocated to all Premium performance levels by 25% at no additional cost.
trans-unit.target: In V12, we increased the database throughput units (DTUs) allocated to all Premium performance levels by 25% at no additional cost.

trans-unit.source: Even greater performance gains can be achieved with new features like:
trans-unit.target: Even greater performance gains can be achieved with new features like:

trans-unit.source: Support for in-memory <link><linkText>columnstore indexes</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Support for in-memory <link><linkText>columnstore indexes</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Table partitioning by rows</linkText><title></title></link> with related enhancements to <link><linkText>TRUNCATE TABLE</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Table partitioning by rows</linkText><title></title></link> with related enhancements to <link><linkText>TRUNCATE TABLE</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The availability of dynamic management views <link><linkText>(DMVs)</linkText><title></title></link> and Extended Events<link><linkText>(XEvents)</linkText><title></title></link> to help monitor and tune performance.
trans-unit.target: The availability of dynamic management views <link><linkText>(DMVs)</linkText><title></title></link> and Extended Events<link><linkText>(XEvents)</linkText><title></title></link> to help monitor and tune performance.

trans-unit.source: Better support for cloud SaaS vendors
trans-unit.target: Better support for cloud SaaS vendors

trans-unit.source: Only in V12, we released the new Standard performance level S3 and the public preview of <link><linkText>elastic database pools</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Only in V12, we released the new Standard performance level S3 and the public preview of <link><linkText>elastic database pools</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: This is a solution specifically designed for cloud SaaS vendors.
trans-unit.target: This is a solution specifically designed for cloud SaaS vendors.

trans-unit.source: With elastic database pools, you can:
trans-unit.target: With elastic database pools, you can:

trans-unit.source: Share DTUs amongst databases to reduce costs for large numbers of databases.
trans-unit.target: Share DTUs amongst databases to reduce costs for large numbers of databases.

trans-unit.source: Execute <link><linkText>elastic database jobs</linkText><title></title></link> to manage databases at scale.
trans-unit.target: Execute <link><linkText>elastic database jobs</linkText><title></title></link> to manage databases at scale.

trans-unit.source: Security enhancements
trans-unit.target: Security enhancements

trans-unit.source: Security is a primary concern for anyone who runs their business in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Security is a primary concern for anyone who runs their business in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: The latest security features released in V12 include:
trans-unit.target: The latest security features released in V12 include:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Row-level security</linkText><title></title></link> (RLS)
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Row-level security</linkText><title></title></link> (RLS)

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Dynamic Data Masking</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Dynamic Data Masking</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Contained databases</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Contained databases</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Application roles</linkText><title></title></link> managed with GRANT, DENY, REVOKE
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Application roles</linkText><title></title></link> managed with GRANT, DENY, REVOKE

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Transparent Data Encryption</linkText><title></title></link> (TDE)
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Transparent Data Encryption</linkText><title></title></link> (TDE)

trans-unit.source: Increased business continuity when recovery is needed
trans-unit.target: Increased business continuity when recovery is needed

trans-unit.source: V12 offers significantly improved recovery point objectives (RPOs) and estimated recovery times (ERTs):
trans-unit.target: V12 offers significantly improved recovery point objectives (RPOs) and estimated recovery times (ERTs):

trans-unit.source: Business continuity feature
trans-unit.target: Business continuity feature

trans-unit.source: Earlier version
trans-unit.target: Earlier version

trans-unit.source: Geo-restore
trans-unit.target: Geo-restore

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 24 hours.<html></html>• ERT < 12 hours.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 24 hours.<html></html>• ERT < 12 hours.

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 1 hour.<html></html>• ERT < 12 hours.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 1 hour.<html></html>• ERT < 12 hours.

trans-unit.source: Standard geo-replication
trans-unit.target: Standard geo-replication

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 30 minutes.<html></html>• ERT < 2 hours.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 30 minutes.<html></html>• ERT < 2 hours.

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 5 seconds.<html></html>• ERT < 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 5 seconds.<html></html>• ERT < 30 seconds.

trans-unit.source: Active geo-replication
trans-unit.target: Active geo-replication

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 5 minutes.<html></html>• ERT < 1 hour.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 5 minutes.<html></html>• ERT < 1 hour.

trans-unit.source: • RPO < 5 seconds.<html></html>• ERT < 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: • RPO < 5 seconds.<html></html>• ERT < 30 seconds.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>SQL Database business continuity</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>SQL Database business continuity</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: More reasons to upgrade now
trans-unit.target: More reasons to upgrade now

trans-unit.source: There are many good reasons why customers should upgrade now to Azure SQL Database V12 from V11:
trans-unit.target: There are many good reasons why customers should upgrade now to Azure SQL Database V12 from V11:

trans-unit.source: SQL Database V12 has a long list of features beyond those of V11.
trans-unit.target: SQL Database V12 has a long list of features beyond those of V11.

trans-unit.source: We continue to add new features to V12, but no new features will be added to V11.
trans-unit.target: We continue to add new features to V12, but no new features will be added to V11.

trans-unit.source: Most new features are released on SQL Database V12 before they being released for Microsoft SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Most new features are released on SQL Database V12 before they being released for Microsoft SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Are you using V12 already?
trans-unit.target: Are you using V12 already?

trans-unit.source: One easy way to see if you have a database or logical server running on an earlier version of the SQL Database service is to do the following:
trans-unit.target: One easy way to see if you have a database or logical server running on an earlier version of the SQL Database service is to do the following:

trans-unit.source: Go to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Go to the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click Browse.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse.

trans-unit.source: Click SQL Servers.
trans-unit.target: Click SQL Servers.

trans-unit.source: The icon next to your server or database tells the story:
trans-unit.target: The icon next to your server or database tells the story:

trans-unit.source: Icon for a v12 server V12 logical server
trans-unit.target: Icon for a v12 server V12 logical server

trans-unit.source: Icon for earlier version server Earlier version logical server
trans-unit.target: Icon for earlier version server Earlier version logical server

trans-unit.source: Another technique to ascertain the version is to run the SELECT @@version; statement in your database, and view the results similar to:
trans-unit.target: Another technique to ascertain the version is to run the SELECT @@version; statement in your database, and view the results similar to:

trans-unit.source: 12.0.2000.10   (version V12)
trans-unit.target: 12.0.2000.10   (version V12)

trans-unit.source: 11.0.9228.18   (version V11)
trans-unit.target: 11.0.9228.18   (version V11)

trans-unit.source: A V12 database can be hosted only on a V12 logical server.
trans-unit.target: A V12 database can be hosted only on a V12 logical server.

trans-unit.source: And a V12 server can host only V12 databases.
trans-unit.target: And a V12 server can host only V12 databases.

trans-unit.source: If you are not yet running on V12, you can upgrade your logical server by following the steps in <link><linkText>Upgrade to SQL Database V12 in place</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not yet running on V12, you can upgrade your logical server by following the steps in <link><linkText>Upgrade to SQL Database V12 in place</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> General Availability regions
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> General Availability regions

trans-unit.source: By July 31, 2015, all regions had been promoted to General Availability (GA).
trans-unit.target: By July 31, 2015, all regions had been promoted to General Availability (GA).

trans-unit.source: V12 was released in December 2014, but only at the status of Preview.
trans-unit.target: V12 was released in December 2014, but only at the status of Preview.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Supplemental Terms of Use for Microsoft Azure Previews</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Supplemental Terms of Use for Microsoft Azure Previews</linkText><title></title></link>.
